Text: FW NRG LOI Cc promised attached is the draft LOI that we discussed yesterday We will send some hard copies via overnight mail as well I have been talking to Elaine to schedule June th or your soonest available date for a follow up meeting in Houston We have recently implemented several similar services deals with municipals and industrials in other regions of the country This experience combined with Enrons strong trading presence in the Northeast will allow us to develop a proposal for NRGs sizeable Northeast generation portfolio that is mutually beneficial Well look forward to meeting soon and moving things forward Thanks Bill ph
